reviews.review_msg: Super tough marker who assigns an unusually a high amount of work for a sophomore level history course. Never expected a prof to be so persnickety about citations in every written homework assignment since I lost so many marks as a result of her deductions.

Professor Matsumura is an excellent and engaging professor, and really rewards students who engage with the material in lectures. She hasn't adapted super well to the partially online aspects of modern courses, but in person (and when you can get a hold of her online) she gives good feedback and is really good at explaining the course material.
she is a fair marker on assignments, but she marks hard for the test and her test was not as easy as she said it was going to be.
